<color=orange>Hearthians</color>
1
PLUME: To think, we would not find our friends from <color=orange>Escape Pod 3</color> on the bramble's exterior, but these familiar species preserved within this glacier...
2
1
OENO: This.. This is an incredible discovery.
3
2
OENO: These species.. They must both have traveled as stowaways within fragments of the planet the bramble destroyed, and landed on the planets that would become their current habitats.
4
3
CASSAVA: That these species survived - and continue to thrive on these alien planets - is nothing short of awe-inspiring. Their resilience inspires me greatly!
5
4
PLUME: In the absence of any trace of the survivors here, this discovery.. is a beacon of light.
6
5
PLUME: I would like to learn to follow these species' example, of perserverance and undying courage in the face of hardships.
7
6
CASSAVA: They have much to teach all of us. I am certain that if we simply work together and perservere, our clan will accomplish anything we set our hearts to!
